element-citation.article-title: Catalytic biorefining of plant biomass to non-pyrolytic lignin bio-oil and carbohydrates through hydrogen transfer reactions

ref.mixed-citation: Ferrini, P., Rinaldi, R.., 2014. Catalytic biorefining of plant biomass to non-pyrolytic lignin bio-oil and carbohydrates through hydrogen transfer reactions. Angew. Chem. Int. Ed. 53, 8634-8639.
